actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to impose a windfall profits tax on natural gas which is sold in interstate commerce and which is exempt from price regulation under emergency natural gas legislation.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to impose a graduated excise tax on the profits on natural gas sales attributable to lifting the price controls on interstate sales under the Emergency Natural Gas Act. Imposes the tax on the beneficial owners of the well head property.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to impose a windfall profits tax on natural gas which is sold in interstate commerce and which is exempt from price regulation under emergency natural gas legislation.
